title: PRIMAL Unleashed
description: Khod Valley, Afghanistan, 1990. An abandoned Spetsnaz platoon fights to the death. What secret are they hiding? Kiev, Ukraine, current day. A former Spetsnaz soldier, now arms dealer, has entered into a deadly contract with a ruthless client. His greed could plunge the Middle East into war. From the shadows, a team of professionals is watching. A covert organization, independent of any nation or corporation, free to strike at the untouchable. They are PRIMAL, and they will see justice served.
author: Jack Silkstone
